Package org.rhwlab.snight

Class Summary
Config  
Identity Singleton object to set cell names in nuclei files Based originally on the StarryNite cell_identity.h code
Loc Loc is used in Identity and Analysis4.
Movie a class to emulate a Movie_t struct in StarryNight
In the June 2006 modifications the role for this object was reduced, but it was retained to avoid unnecessary changes elsewhere in the code.
NucleiMgr maintains a structure with all nuclei in the experiment
handles naming of nuclei completely using code closely derived from StarryNight
provision for reading nuclei files into the structure and for writing files out of the structure
Nucleus a class to emulate the Nucleus_t struct in StarryNight
all member variables have public access; this makes comparisons with the C code, where needed, easy
NucZipper takes the current contents of the NucleiMgr and prepares a zip file with a structure like the nuclei portion of a normal input file
this can be called following an edit
Parameters a class to emulate a Parameters_t struct in StarryNight
In the June 2006 modification, the notion of reading the StarryNite parameters file was eliminated.
XMLConfig  
ZipNuclei Instantiated in AncesTree.
